TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_bakan, title = bakan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/bakan} }

S.FORM: == bakan == 刀 / u bakan sa sapikasuy nu tatama. siwkay nu bakan u bakan sa, u sapicikcik a sakulak, masinang i tatapal, kyu taneng micikcik tu tuutuud. tayza i buyu atu maluk, sibakan tu ku tademaw. taneng sapikawaw, taneng sapidiput, anu izaw ku aadupan, taneng patalaw atu midebung. tinaku a kamu pabakanen / taneng tu pabakanen ku wawa ni Benel ci Kumad. sibakan 帶刀 / caay ka walesay sibakan ku tatama tahekal. sibakanay 帶刀的 / au ci Kacaw ku sibakanay tayza i buyu'. u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika . 刀(disambiguation) is an East Asian word which means sabre, knife, or certain types of sword.

== bakan == 刀 / o bakan sa sapikasoy no tatama. siwkay no bakan o bakan sa, o sapicikcik a sakolak, masinang i tatapal, kyo taneng micikcik to tootood. tayza i boyo ato malok, sibakan to ko tademaw. taneng sapikawaw, taneng sapidipot, ano izaw ko aadopan, taneng patalaw ato midebong. tinako a kamo pabakanen / taneng to pabakanen ko wawa ni Benel ci Komad. sibakan 帶刀 / caay ka walesay sibakan ko tatama tahekal. sibakanay 帶刀的 / ao ci Kacaw ko sibakanay tayza i boyo'. o solit no Holam ato Amilika . 刀(disambigoation) is an East Asian word which means sabre, knife, or certain types of sword.
